response.overview: Thrown together under incredible circumstances, two strangers must discover courage and strength when they begin a journey across the treacherous African desert! Equipped only with their wits and the expertise of a native bushman who befriends them, they are determined to triumph over impossible odds and reach their destination. But along the way, the trio face a primitive desert wilderness.
response.tagline: A far off land. A far off journey. A far off adventure.
response.title: A Far Off Place

titles.title: Die Spur des Windes – Das letzte große Abenteuer

results.name: A Far Off Place  www kinokopilka tv трейлер
